Introduction¶

Setting Up Studio¶

Downloading Studio¶

Visit Vuforia Studio and login using the Username: iotworkshop and Password: @IOTAcademic18.

Development Tools¶

  • GitKraken: Git GUI for managing developer workflow)
  • Sublime Text: Text editor for code

GitHub Integration¶

GitHub is our central code repository that contains all Convergence Lab Studio projects.

Visit our team repo at Academic Team GitHub.

Attention

To make a project private, please contact Mark Cheli (mcheli@ptc.com) to receive clearance.

Setting Up Studio CLI¶

To make use of the Studio CLI tool, run commands from your Vuforia Studio projects folder Documents/VuforiaStudio/Projects/

See Studio CLI Repo for further documentation.

Install the Studio CLI package:

gulp

Initializing Projects¶

Initializing a new Studio project:

$ vufo init
